column2: <c=@Flavor>The same hands that make the pattern also unmake it.</c>

<c=@abilitytype>Phantasm.</c> Fire multiple crippling bullets at your target and summon an illusion that unloads its pistols on your target.
<c=@abilitytype>Conjure.</c> Manifest a lightning hammer in your hands and at the target location. Wielders of this weapon gain increased precision and ferocity.
